name: IN GROTTO
description:
Inspired from an experience I had but with exaggerated elements. Experience going inside a grotto and finding a way out through different solutions. Being in a dark place might be scary at first but then you realize that it can be beautiful.

In Grotto gives the experience to explore a grotto with different sections blocked by a door. Interact with objects and find solutions to access a new section, each section has different solutions to progress through. As you do, the grotto becomes more beautiful.
